title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama into LangChain LLM, Chat and Embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI): themes, code highlighting, multi-model chats, RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and CLI wrapper around Ollama with persistent chat sessions and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; offers synchronous and asynchronous APIs with POJO mapping.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-chatbot-react
summary: React component library that provides a ChatGPT-style chat interface backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready docker-compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Chroma, QDrant, and Nginx.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed requests/responses and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping Ollama’s REST API with serde types and tokio streams.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-mode to chat with Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for summarizing notes, brainstorming, and Q&A.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example showing how to scale Ollama models across a GPU cluster with autoscaling.

title: reddit/r/ollama - Weekly discussion thread
summary: Active community thread where users share new tools, model benchmarks, and troubleshooting tips.
